name: Rock Almighty
description:
This game was created for the GameJam: 
https://itch.io/jam/game-based-on-movieseries

This is swirled take on the movie Bruce Almighty; when given God-like powers, what do you do? In this Universe, you throw holy boulders and play whack-a-mole with stupid humans.

----------------------------------------------

This project was a prototype test for a blood system that didn't include an expensive decal backend. Rather, all blood is done through projection dynamically. 

Credits: GoW for sounds.
